# Data

This part describe all inventories and ancillary data gathering and preparation. Data encompass:

-   [Inventories](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/11_inventories.html): the material from TmFO and other sites for forest and biodiviersity trajectories based on tree diameter censuses
-   [Logging](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/12_logging.html): site and/or plot logging information
-   [Climate](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/13_climate.html): site and/or plot climate data
-   [Soil](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/14_soil.html): site and/or plot soil data
-   [Landscape](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/15_landscape.html): site and/or plot landscape data & metrics
-   Functional [traits](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/16_traits.html): species functional traits
-   [Phylogeny](https://bioforest-project.github.io/LoggingDiversity/17_phylogeny.html): species phylogeny
